item.title: You Won't Believe What Happens When Blackpink and BTS Collide on 'How You Like That'!
item.description: Introduction In June 2020, the K-pop world was rocked by the unexpected collaboration of two of its biggest stars, Blackpink and BTS. The two groups joined forces to create the song “How You Like That”, a powerful and upbeat track that quickly became a global hit. In this blog post, we’ll take a look at the song, its musical elements, its lyrical meaning, and its impact on the K-pop world.
